smile.math.matrix

Class ColumnMajorMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.math.matrix.ColumnMajorMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DenseMatrix, IMatrix

    public class ColumnMajorMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements DenseMatrix
    A dense matrix whose data is stored in a single 1D array of doubles in column major order.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColumnMajorMatrix(double[][] A)
      Constructor.
      ColumnMajorMatrix(int rows, int cols)
      Constructor of all-zero matrix.
      ColumnMajorMatrix(int rows, int cols, double value)
      Constructor.
      ColumnMajorMatrix(int rows, int cols, double mu, double sigma)
      Constructor of matrix with normal random values with given mean and standard dev.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColumnMajorMatrix aat()
      Returns A * A'
      ColumnMajorMatrix add(int i, int j, double x)
      A[i][j] += x
      double apply(int i, int j)
      Returns the entry value at row i and column j.
      double[] array()
      Return the one-dimensional array of matrix.
      void asolve(double[] b, double[] x)
      Solve Ad * x = b for the preconditioner matrix Ad.
      ColumnMajorMatrix ata()
      Returns A' * A
      void atx(double[] x, double[] y)
      y = A' * x
      void atxpy(double[] x, double[] y)
      y = A' * x + y
      void atxpy(double[] x, double[] y, double b)
      y = A' * x + b * y
      void ax(double[] x, double[] y)
      y = A * x
      void axpy(double[] x, double[] y)
      y = A * x + y
      void axpy(double[] x, double[] y, double b)
      y = A * x + b * y
      ColumnMajorMatrix div(int i, int j, double x)
      A[i][j] /= x
      double get(int i, int j)
      Returns the entry value at row i and column j.
      ColumnMajorMatrix mul(int i, int j, double x)
      A[i][j] *= x
      int ncols()
      Returns the number of columns.
      int nrows()
      Returns the number of rows.
      ColumnMajorMatrix set(int i, int j, double x)
      Set the entry value at row i and column j.
      void setDiag(double[] diag)
      Sets the diagonal to the values of diag as long as possible (i.e while there are elements left in diag or the dim of matrix is not big enough.
      ColumnMajorMatrix sub(int i, int j, double x)
      A[i][j] -= x

      Returns the matrix transpose.

      • asolve

        public void asolve(double[] b,
                   double[] x)
        Description copied from interface: IMatrix
        Solve Ad * x = b for the preconditioner matrix Ad. The preconditioner matrix Ad is close to A and should be easy to solve for linear systems. This method is useful for preconditioned conjugate gradient method. The preconditioner matrix could be as simple as the trivial diagonal part of A in some cases.
        Specified by:
        asolve in interface IMatrix
